Name: Kickstarter
Description: Percentage of raised funds goes to Kickstarter and transaction fees

Name: Indiegogo
Description: Percentage of raised funds goes to Indiegogo and transaction fees

Name: Fig
Description: Percentage of revenue is split among Fig and the investors

Name: Indie Fund
Description: All revenue goes to repaying the funds then 25% rev-share until Indie Fund's investment is doubled within two years after your game is released

Name: UK Games Fund
Description: Provides support packages for early-stage projects being developed by small video game companies based in the United Kingdom

Name: GDBAY Global Games Pitch
Description: Opprotunity to pitch game to audience of publishers

Name: Bitkraft
Description: Early Stage Venture Capital investor for gaming, esports, and interactive media.

Name: Wings Interactive
Description: Focus on helping women and minority groups

Name: Gamasutra Article
Description: List of Incubator, Accelerators, Funding Opprotunities

Name: GamesRound
Description: A platform to help studios partner with publishers and investors
